notes.note:
Option to view your open tabs side by side in a [grid view][1].


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/manage-tabs-firefox-android#w_change-open-tabs-view

Ability to [delete downloaded files][1] within the app.


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/downloads-firefox-android#w_view-and-delete-download-files
WebRender rolls out to more of our users on Android, those on the Mali-G GPU series, bringing smoother animation and scrolling to the majority of our Android users.
Improved scrolling accuracy and control and fixed cases of unexpected scroll acceleration.

text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox.


  [1]: http://blog.mozilla.org/community/2020/12/11/the-new-faces-in-firefox-84/
title: Firefox for Android 84.0 Release
